pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 10     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 3    $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Jungles    $(br)> $(n)Breeding/Trust:$() Raw Cod, Raw Salmon     $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Attack $(thing)Chickens$() and $(thing)Baby Turtles$(). $(thing)Creeper$() and $(thing)Phantoms$() avoid cats.
